verses.text_plain: Now when Ezra had prayed, and when he had confessed, weeping and casting himself down before the house of God, there assembled unto him out of Israel a very great congregation of men and women and children: for the people wept very sore.
verses.verse_html:
1Now when Ezra had prayed, and when he had confessed, weeping and casting himself down before the house of God, there assembled unto him out of Israel a very great congregation of men and women and children: for the people wept very sore. ▼
▼ wept…: Heb. wept a great weeping

footnotes.body_text: ▼ wept…: Heb. wept a great weeping
footnotes.body_html: ▼ wept…: Heb. wept a great weeping

verses.text_plain: And Shechaniah the son of Jehiel, one of the sons of Elam, answered and said unto Ezra, We have trespassed against our God, and have taken strange wives of the people of the land: yet now there is hope in Israel concerning this thing.
verses.verse_html: 2And Shechaniah the son of Jehiel, one of the sons of Elam, answered and said unto Ezra, We have trespassed against our God, and have taken strange wives of the people of the land: yet now there is hope in Israel concerning this thing.

verses.text_plain: Now therefore let us make a covenant with our God to put away all the wives, and such as are born of them, according to the counsel of my lord, and of those that tremble at the commandment of our God; and let it be done according to the law.
verses.verse_html:
3Now therefore let us make a covenant with our God to put away all the wives, and such as are born of them, according to the counsel of my lord, and of those that tremble at the commandment of our God; and let it be done according to the law. ▼
▼ to put…: Heb. to bring forth

tokens.text: of them, according to the counsel

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to put…: Heb. to bring forth
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to put…: Heb. to bring forth

verses.text_plain: Arise; for this matter belongeth unto thee: we also will be with thee: be of good courage, and do it.
verses.verse_html: 4Arise; for this matter belongeth unto thee: we also will be with thee: be of good courage, and do it.

tokens.text: with thee: be of good courage

verses.text_plain: Then arose Ezra, and made the chief priests, the Levites, and all Israel, to swear that they should do according to this word. And they sware.
verses.verse_html: 5Then arose Ezra, and made the chief priests, the Levites, and all Israel, to swear that they should do according to this word. And they sware.

verses.text_plain: Then Ezra rose up from before the house of God, and went into the chamber of Johanan the son of Eliashib: and when he came thither, he did eat no bread, nor drink water: for he mourned because of the transgression of them that had been carried away.
verses.verse_html: 6Then Ezra rose up from before the house of God, and went into the chamber of Johanan the son of Eliashib: and when he came thither, he did eat no bread, nor drink water: for he mourned because of the transgression of them that had been carried away.

tokens.text: of them that had been carried away

verses.text_plain: And they made proclamation throughout Judah and Jerusalem unto all the children of the captivity, that they should gather themselves together unto Jerusalem;
verses.verse_html: 7And they made proclamation throughout Judah and Jerusalem unto all the children of the captivity, that they should gather themselves together unto Jerusalem;

tokens.text: that they should gather themselves together

verses.text_plain: And that whosoever would not come within three days, according to the counsel of the princes and the elders, all his substance should be forfeited, and himself separated from the congregation of those that had been carried away.
verses.verse_html:
8And that whosoever would not come within three days, according to the counsel of the princes and the elders, all his substance should be forfeited, and himself separated from the congregation of those that had been carried away. ▼
▼ forfeited: Heb. devoted

tokens.text: And that whosoever would not come
of those that had been carried away

verses.text_plain: Then all the men of Judah and Benjamin gathered themselves together unto Jerusalem within three days. It was the ninth month, on the twentieth day of the month; and all the people sat in the street of the house of God, trembling because of this matter, and for the great rain.
verses.verse_html:
9Then all the men of Judah and Benjamin gathered themselves together unto Jerusalem within three days. It was the ninth month, on the twentieth day of the month; and all the people sat in the street of the house of God, trembling because of this matter, and for the great rain. ▼
▼ the great…: Heb. the showers

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the great…: Heb. the showers

verses.text_plain: And Ezra the priest stood up, and said unto them, Ye have transgressed, and have taken strange wives, to increase the trespass of Israel.
verses.verse_html:
10And Ezra the priest stood up, and said unto them, Ye have transgressed, and have taken strange wives, to increase the trespass of Israel. ▼
▼ have taken: Heb. have caused to dwell, or, have brought back

footnotes.body_text: ▼ have taken: Heb. have caused to dwell, or, have brought back
footnotes.body_html: ▼ have taken: Heb. have caused to dwell, or, have brought back

verses.text_plain: Now therefore make confession unto the Lord God of your fathers, and do his pleasure: and separate yourselves from the people of the land, and from the strange wives.
verses.verse_html: 11Now therefore make confession unto the Lord God of your fathers, and do his pleasure: and separate yourselves from the people of the land, and from the strange wives.

verses.text_plain: Then all the congregation answered and said with a loud voice, As thou hast said, so must we do.
verses.verse_html: 12Then all the congregation answered and said with a loud voice, As thou hast said, so must we do.

verses.text_plain: But the people are many, and it is a time of much rain, and we are not able to stand without, neither is this a work of one day or two: for we are many that have transgressed in this thing.
verses.verse_html:
13But the people are many, and it is a time of much rain, and we are not able to stand without, neither is this a work of one day or two: for we are many that have transgressed in this thing. ▼
▼ we are many…: or, we have greatly offended in this thing

footnotes.body_text: ▼ we are many…: or, we have greatly offended in this thing
footnotes.body_html: ▼ we are many…: or, we have greatly offended in this thing

verses.text_plain: Let now our rulers of all the congregation stand, and let all them which have taken strange wives in our cities come at appointed times, and with them the elders of every city, and the judges thereof, until the fierce wrath of our God for this matter be turned from us.
verses.verse_html:
14Let now our rulers of all the congregation stand, and let all them which have taken strange wives in our cities come at appointed times, and with them the elders of every city, and the judges thereof, until the fierce wrath of our God for this matter be turned from us. ▼
▼ for this…: or, till this matter be dispatched

tokens.text: and let all them which have taken

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for this…: or, till this matter be dispatched
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for this…: or, till this matter be dispatched

verses.text_plain: Only Jonathan the son of Asahel and Jahaziah the son of Tikvah were employed about this matter: and Meshullam and Shabbethai the Levite helped them.
verses.verse_html:
15Only Jonathan the son of Asahel and Jahaziah the son of Tikvah were employed about this matter: and Meshullam and Shabbethai the Levite helped them. ▼
▼ were…: Heb. stood

verses.text_plain: And the children of the captivity did so. And Ezra the priest, with certain chief of the fathers, after the house of their fathers, and all of them by their names, were separated, and sat down in the first day of the tenth month to examine the matter.
verses.verse_html: 16And the children of the captivity did so. And Ezra the priest, with certain chief of the fathers, after the house of their fathers, and all of them by their names, were separated, and sat down in the first day of the tenth month to examine the matter.

verses.text_plain: And they made an end with all the men that had taken strange wives by the first day of the first month.
verses.verse_html: 17And they made an end with all the men that had taken strange wives by the first day of the first month.

verses.text_plain: And among the sons of the priests there were found that had taken strange wives: namely, of the sons of Jeshua the son of Jozadak, and his brethren; Maaseiah, and Eliezer, and Jarib, and Gedaliah.
verses.verse_html: 18And among the sons of the priests there were found that had taken strange wives: namely, of the sons of Jeshua the son of Jozadak, and his brethren; Maaseiah, and Eliezer, and Jarib, and Gedaliah.

verses.text_plain: And they gave their hands that they would put away their wives; and being guilty, they offered a ram of the flock for their trespass.
verses.verse_html: 19And they gave their hands that they would put away their wives; and being guilty, they offered a ram of the flock for their trespass.

verses.text_plain: And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
verses.verse_html: 20And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.

verses.text_plain: And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.
verses.verse_html: 21And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.

verses.text_plain: And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
verses.verse_html: 22And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.

verses.text_plain: Also of the Levites; Jozabad, and Shimei, and Kelaiah, (the same is Kelita,) Pethahiah, Judah, and Eliezer.
verses.verse_html: 23Also of the Levites; Jozabad, and Shimei, and Kelaiah, (the same is Kelita,) Pethahiah, Judah, and Eliezer.

verses.text_plain: Of the singers also; Eliashib: and of the porters; Shallum, and Telem, and Uri.
verses.verse_html: 24Of the singers also; Eliashib: and of the porters; Shallum, and Telem, and Uri.

verses.text_plain: Moreover of Israel: of the sons of Parosh; Ramiah, and Jeziah, and Malchiah, and Miamin, and Eleazar, and Malchijah, and Benaiah.
verses.verse_html: 25Moreover of Israel: of the sons of Parosh; Ramiah, and Jeziah, and Malchiah, and Miamin, and Eleazar, and Malchijah, and Benaiah.

verses.text_plain: And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.
verses.verse_html: 26And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Eliah.

verses.text_plain: And of the sons of Zattu; Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, and Jeremoth, and Zabad, and Aziza.
verses.verse_html: 27And of the sons of Zattu; Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, and Jeremoth, and Zabad, and Aziza.

verses.text_plain: Of the sons also of Bebai; Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, and Athlai.
verses.verse_html: 28Of the sons also of Bebai; Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, and Athlai.

verses.text_plain: And of the sons of Bani; Meshullam, Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.
verses.verse_html: 29And of the sons of Bani; Meshullam, Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.

verses.text_plain: And of the sons of Pahath–moab; Adna, and Chelal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezaleel, and Binnui, and Manasseh.
verses.verse_html: 30And of the sons of Pahath–moab; Adna, and Chelal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezaleel, and Binnui, and Manasseh.

verses.text_plain: And of the sons of Harim; Eliezer, Ishijah, Malchiah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
verses.verse_html: 31And of the sons of Harim; Eliezer, Ishijah, Malchiah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,

verses.text_plain: Benjamin, Malluch, and Shemariah.
verses.verse_html: 32Benjamin, Malluch, and Shemariah.

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
verses.verse_html: 33Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Bani; Maadai, Amram, and Uel,
verses.verse_html: 34Of the sons of Bani; Maadai, Amram, and Uel,

verses.text_plain: Benaiah, Bedeiah, Chelluh,
verses.verse_html: 35Benaiah, Bedeiah, Chelluh,

verses.text_plain: Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,
verses.verse_html: 36Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,

verses.text_plain: Mattaniah, Mattenai, and Jaasau,
verses.verse_html: 37Mattaniah, Mattenai, and Jaasau,

verses.text_plain: And Bani, and Binnui, Shimei,
verses.verse_html: 38And Bani, and Binnui, Shimei,

verses.text_plain: And Shelemiah, and Nathan, and Adaiah,
verses.verse_html: 39And Shelemiah, and Nathan, and Adaiah,

verses.text_plain: Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
verses.verse_html:
40Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai, ▼
▼ Machnadebai: or, Mabnadebai, according to some copies

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Machnadebai: or, Mabnadebai, according to some copies
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Machnadebai: or, Mabnadebai, according to some copies

verses.text_plain: Azareel, and Shelemiah, Shemariah,
verses.verse_html: 41Azareel, and Shelemiah, Shemariah,

verses.text_plain: Shallum, Amariah, and Joseph.
verses.verse_html: 42Shallum, Amariah, and Joseph.

verses.text_plain: Of the sons of Nebo; Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jadau, and Joel, Benaiah.
verses.verse_html: 43Of the sons of Nebo; Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jadau, and Joel, Benaiah.

verses.text_plain: All these had taken strange wives: and some of them had wives by whom they had children.
verses.verse_html: 44All these had taken strange wives: and some of them had wives by whom they had children.
